role.description: The type of user, such as a small business, a tax agent, a healthcare practitioner

goal.description: What the user wants to do

benefit.description: Why the user wants to do it

applies_to_all_organisations.description: Whether all linked organisations meet this need

impact.description: Impact of GOV.UK not doing this

justifications.description: How this need fits in the proposition for GOV.UK

met_when.description: Provides criteria that define when this user need has been met

other_evidence.description: Any other evidence to support this need, ie. user research, campaigns, user demand

need_id.description: Six digit id which used to be the primary id for Needs. Still being displayed in Maslow and Info-Frontend, but likely to be deprecated in the future.

status.description: Validation status of the need, ie. proposed, valid, not valid or valid with conditions

yearly_need_views.description: Number of pageviews specific to this need generated each year

yearly_searches.description: Number of searches specific to this need carried out each year

yearly_site_views.description: Number of yearly pageviews of the whole site of the requester

yearly_user_contacts.description: Number of user contacts received about this need each year. Includes calls to contact centres, emails, customer service tickets

author_name.description: First name and Surname of the person that is creating or modifying the need.

author_email.description: Email address of the person that is creating or modifying the need.
